post_text: January 23, 2018 at 6:56 PM#1I'm trying, and having tons of difficulty, to write a macro that will change the destination of MIDI notes.For example, let's say Song 1 is playing and MIDI notes 1-50 will trigger cues 1-50. Simple.Then, hypothetical Macro is run for Song 2, and MIDI notes 1-50 will now trigger cues 1-50 on Song 2. The same macro but for Song 3 is run and then MIDI notes 1-50 will trigger cues 1-50 of Song 3. I'm having trouble accessing MIDI settings in the command line which is halting me from being able to make this macro. Any advice?Thanks in advance!

posts.post_text: January 23, 2018 at 8:01 PM#2There is no remote options in the grandMA2 to trigger specificCuesYou may however triggerExecutorscreate MidiNote remote for Executor 1 - 50 "Current Page", then you just have to change Page to have a new song, and have the same midinotes trigger different Executors

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 24, 2018 at 4:01 AM#3You could have each midinote trigger a CMD which was "Goto Cue x" (which would assume the selected executor), at which point you would then just need to make sure the executor the chosen song is Selected.
